titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the rate of duty on 2-chloro-N-(4'-chloro-biphenyl-2-yl)-nicotinamide.
A bill to reduce temporarily the rate of duty on 2-chloro-N-(4'-chloro-biphenyl-2-yl)-nicotinamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on 2-chloro-N-(4'-chloro-biphenyl-2-yl)-nicotinamide.
